name: pp-up
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases a selected move’s max PP by 20% its original max PP, to a maximum of 1.6×. Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
short_effect: Raises a move’s max PP by 20%.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A medicine that can slightly raise the maximum PP of a single move that has been learned by the target Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A medicine that can slightly raise the maximum PP of a single move that has been learned by the target Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A medicine that slightly raises the maximum PP of a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokémon.
